raritan.name: raritan

revisions.description: 1) Added agentInetPortNumber under trapInformation 2) Added agentInetPortNumber as a varbind to all traps

SHX 30 support: - add lhxVoltageLow, lhxBaseElectronicsFailure and lhxCondenserPumpFailure traps - add model and fwVersion to lhxConfigurationTable - add sensorName to sensorConfigurationTable - support valvePosition sensor type - add sysContact, sysName, sysLocation to all traps
Extend LHX MIB: - add maximumCoolingState - add alertState - add defaultFanSpeed - make defaultFanSpeed read-writable
The first version of the MIB.

raritan.contactinfo: Author: Raritan Americas, Inc. postal: Raritan Americas, Inc. 400 Cottontail Lane Somerset, NJ 08873 email: tech@raritan.com phone: +1 732 764 8886
raritan.description: This MIB describes the SNMP functions of the Schroff Varistar LHX heat exchanger supported by Raritan devices.

OperationalStateEnumeration.name: OperationalStateEnumeration
OperationalStateEnumeration.description: The operational states of an lhx controller.

GwSensorTypeEnumeration.name: GwSensorTypeEnumeration
GwSensorTypeEnumeration.description: The types an lhx sensor can be.

SensorUnitsEnumeration.name: SensorUnitsEnumeration
SensorUnitsEnumeration.description: The units an lhx sensor can be.

SensorStateEnumeration.name: SensorStateEnumeration
SensorStateEnumeration.description: The states a sensor can be in.

lhxSensorFailure.name: lhxSensorFailure
lhxSensorFailure.description: A sensor failure (broken or short circuit) occurred.

lhxThresholdAirOutlet.name: lhxThresholdAirOutlet
lhxThresholdAirOutlet.description: The air outlet temperature threshold was crossed.

lhxThresholdAirInlet.name: lhxThresholdAirInlet
lhxThresholdAirInlet.description: The air inlet temperature threshold was crossed.

lhxThresholdWaterInlet.name: lhxThresholdWaterInlet
lhxThresholdWaterInlet.description: The water inlet temperature threshold was crossed.

lhxExternalWaterCoolingFailure.name: lhxExternalWaterCoolingFailure
lhxExternalWaterCoolingFailure.description: An external water cooling failure occurred.

lhxThresholdWaterOutlet.name: lhxThresholdWaterOutlet
lhxThresholdWaterOutlet.description: The water outlet temperature threshold was crossed.

lhxParameterDataLoss.name: lhxParameterDataLoss
lhxParameterDataLoss.description: Data loss in parameter memory was detected.

lhxStBusError.name: lhxStBusError
lhxStBusError.description: An ST-Bus communication error was detected.

lhxVoltageLow.name: lhxVoltageLow
lhxVoltageLow.description: The supply voltage of an LHX became low.

lhxBaseElectronicsFailure.name: lhxBaseElectronicsFailure
lhxBaseElectronicsFailure.description: The base electronics of an LHX controller failed.

deviceName.name: deviceName
deviceName.description: The user-defined name for the Device.

deviceInetIPAddress.name: deviceInetIPAddress
deviceInetIPAddress.description: The current IP address. A value of 0.0.0.0 indicates an error or an unset option.

lhxErrorCode.name: lhxErrorCode
lhxErrorCode.description: The LHX error code (F1 - F25, EP).

portId.name: portId
portId.description: A unique value for the physical port, the LHX controlller is connected to. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of portCount.

oldSensorState.name: oldSensorState
oldSensorState.description: The old sensor state used in Sensor State Transition traps.

sensorTypeId.name: sensorTypeId
sensorTypeId.description: A unique value for the type of sensor.

sensorId.name: sensorId
sensorId.description: A unique value for each sensor. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of sensorCount.

oldOperationalState.name: oldOperationalState
oldOperationalState.description: The old operational state used in Operational State Transition traps.

agentInetPortNumber.name: agentInetPortNumber
agentInetPortNumber.description: The UDP port number used for accessing the SNMP agent on the device. Examples: If the associated device MIB (PX2-MIB, EMD-MIB) has deviceCascadeType set to portForwarding, then master: 50500 slave 1:50501 slave 2: 50502 ...... If cascading mode is not portForwarding and default (Standard) ports are being used, then port: 161

portCount.name: portCount
portCount.description: The number of lhx units supported.

sensorCountTable.name: sensorCountTable
sensorCountTable.description: A list of lhx sensor count extries.

sensorCountEntry.name: sensorCountEntry
sensorCountEntry.description: An entry containing the number of lhx sensors of a certain type.

lhxConfigurationTable.name: lhxConfigurationTable
lhxConfigurationTable.description: A list of lhx controller configuration extries. The number of entries is given by the value of portCount.

lhxConfigurationEntry.name: lhxConfigurationEntry
lhxConfigurationEntry.description: An entry containing parameters for an lhx.

operationalState.name: operationalState
operationalState.description: The operational state of the lhx controller. To switch LHX power state while controller is connected, set operationalState to 1 (off) or 2 (on). Switching power state while LHX is disconnected or to 0 (disconnected) is undefined.

setpointWaterValve.name: setpointWaterValve
setpointWaterValve.description: The setpoint of the water valve.

defaultFanSpeed.name: defaultFanSpeed
defaultFanSpeed.description: The 'default' fan speed during normal operation in per mill. Default is 80% (= 800).

maximumCoolingState.name: maximumCoolingState
maximumCoolingState.description: Indicates whether maximum cooling was requested or not. To request maximum cooling, set maximumCoolingState to 1 (true). Setting maximumCoolingState to 2 (false) is undefined, set alertState to 2 (false) instead.

alertState.name: alertState
alertState.description: Indicates whether LHX controler is in alert state or not. To acknowledge alert status, set alertState to 2 (false). Setting alertState to 1 (true) is undefined.

model.name: model
model.description: The model indentifier of an LHX controller.

fwVersion.name: fwVersion
fwVersion.description: The firmware version of an LHX controller.

sensorConfigurationTable.name: sensorConfigurationTable
sensorConfigurationTable.description: A list of lhx sensor configuration extries. The number of entries is given by the value of portCount.

sensorConfigurationEntry.name: sensorConfigurationEntry
sensorConfigurationEntry.description: An entry containing parameters for an lhx.

portIdx.name: portIdx
portIdx.description: A unique value for each port. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of portCount.

sensorTypeIdx.name: sensorTypeIdx
sensorTypeIdx.description: A unique value for the type of sensor.

sensorIdx.name: sensorIdx
sensorIdx.description: A unique value for each sensor. Its value ranges between 1 and the value of sensorCount.

sensorLabel.name: sensorLabel
sensorLabel.description: The short ID of the sensor (e.g. F1, M2).

sensorUnit.name: sensorUnit
sensorUnit.description: The base units. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorDecimalDigits.name: sensorDecimalDigits
sensorDecimalDigits.description: The number of digits displayed to the right of the decimal point. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorMaximum.name: sensorMaximum
sensorMaximum.description: The largest possible value. The value of this OID variable should be scaled by sensorDecimalDigits. For example, if the value is 1 and sensorDecimalDigits is 2, then actual value is 0.01. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorMinimum.name: sensorMinimum
sensorMinimum.description: The smallest possible value. The value of this OID variable should be scaled by sensorDecimalDigits. For example, if the value is 1 and sensorDecimalDigits is 2, then actual value is 0.01. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorHysteresis.name: sensorHysteresis
sensorHysteresis.description: The hysteresis used for deassertions. The value of this OID variable should be scaled by sensorDecimalDigits. For example, if the value is 1 and sensorDecimalDigits is 2, then actual value is 0.01. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorLowerCriticalThreshold.name: sensorLowerCriticalThreshold
sensorLowerCriticalThreshold.description: The lower critical threshold. The value of this OID variable should be scaled by sensorDecimalDigits. For example, if the value is 1 and sensorDecimalDigits is 2, then actual value is 0.01. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorLowerWarningThreshold.name: sensorLowerWarningThreshold
sensorLowerWarningThreshold.description: The lower non-critical (warning) threshold. The value of this OID variable should be scaled by sensorDecimalDigits. For example, if the value is 1 and sensorDecimalDigits is 2, then actual value is 0.01. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorUpperCriticalThreshold.name: sensorUpperCriticalThreshold
sensorUpperCriticalThreshold.description: The upper critical threshold. The value of this OID variable should be scaled by sensorDecimalDigits. For example, if the value is 1 and sensorDecimalDigits is 2, then actual value is 0.01. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorUpperWarningThreshold.name: sensorUpperWarningThreshold
sensorUpperWarningThreshold.description: The upper non-critical (warning) threshold. The value of this OID variable should be scaled by sensorDecimalDigits. For example, if the value is 1 and sensorDecimalDigits is 2, then actual value is 0.01. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorEnabledThresholds.name: sensorEnabledThresholds
sensorEnabledThresholds.description: A bit string which indicates which thresholds are enabled. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorThresholdMaximum.name: sensorThresholdMaximum
sensorThresholdMaximum.description: The largest possible threshold value. The value of this OID variable should be scaled by sensorDecimalDigits. For example, if the value is 1 and sensorDecimalDigits is 2, then actual value is 0.01. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorThresholdMinimum.name: sensorThresholdMinimum
sensorThresholdMinimum.description: The smallest possible threshold value. The value of this OID variable should be scaled by sensorDecimalDigits. For example, if the value is 1 and sensorDecimalDigits is 2, then actual value is 0.01. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

sensorName.name: sensorName
sensorName.description: The descriptive ID of the sensor (e.g. Fan Speed 1).

sensorMeasurementsTable.name: sensorMeasurementsTable
sensorMeasurementsTable.description: A list of external sensor entries. The number of entries is given by the value of sensorCount for the LHX.

sensorMeasurementsEntry.name: sensorMeasurementsEntry
sensorMeasurementsEntry.description: An entry containing measurement objects for an external sensor.

measurementsSensorValue.name: measurementsSensorValue
measurementsSensorValue.description: The sensor reading. This parameter does not apply to state sensors.

complianceRev1.name: complianceRev1
complianceRev1.description: The requirements for conformance to the LHX-MIB.

configurationGroup.name: configurationGroup
configurationGroup.description: A collection of objects representing configuration data.

measurementsGroup.name: measurementsGroup
measurementsGroup.description: A collection of objects providing the measurement capability of LHX.

trapInformationGroup.name: trapInformationGroup
trapInformationGroup.description: A collection of objects providing information in the traps.
